result.html: ar sheol tú an litirHave you sent the letter?
result.ponchtml: ar ẛeol tú an litirHave you sent the letter?

result.eng: Put the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.
result.ga: cuir an litir sa phost le do thoil
result.orig: cuir an litir sa phost le do thoil
result.html: cuir an litir sa phost le do thoilPut the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.
result.ponchtml: cuir an litir sa ṗost le do ṫoilPut the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.

result.eng: This is proof that I have sent the letter.
result.ga: is cruthúnas é seo go bhfuil an litir seolta agam
result.orig: is cruthúnas é seo go bhfuil an litir seolta agam
result.html: is cruthúnas é seo go bhfuil an litir seolta agamThis is proof that I have sent the letter.
result.ponchtml: is cruṫúnas é seo go ḃfuil an litir seolta agamThis is proof that I have sent the letter.

result.html: maidir le do litirRegarding your letter...
result.ponchtml: maidir le do litirRegarding your letter...

result.eng: I am still waiting for the letter.
result.ga: tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litir
result.orig: tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litir
result.html: tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.
result.ponchtml: tá mé fós ag fanaċt leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.

result.eng: He left a letter for me at the reception desk.
result.ga: d'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilte
result.orig: d'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilte
result.html: d'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilteHe left a letter for me at the reception desk.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilteHe left a letter for me at the reception desk.
